description:
See http://docs.rackspacecloud.com/servers/api/cs-bindguide-latest.pdf page 34.

Note that supporting this will require writing some code that several server actions will use (rebuild, resize, revert/confirm resize), as they all show up via the same URL:

POST /servers/<id>/action

and differentiate themselves via the request body.
title: Support server reboot in API
